sentences.en: For young children, getting dressed is a complicated business.
sentences.cn: 对幼童来说，穿衣服是件复杂的事。

sentences.en: His love life was complicated, and involved intense relationships.
sentences.cn: 他的爱情生活很复杂，几段感情都是轰轰烈烈。

sentences.en: I will tell you, sooner or later, all the complicated process.
sentences.cn: 我迟早要把这一复杂的过程全部告诉你.

sentences.en: No matter how complicated the situation was, he could cope with It'successfully.
sentences.cn: 不论情况多么复杂, 他都能应付自如.

sentences.en: The human brain is an incredibly complicated organ.
sentences.cn: 人脑是一个结构极其复杂的器官。
这说明书看起来很难懂。

sentences.en: The mechanism of the machine is very complicated.
sentences.cn: 这台机器的结构是非常复杂的.

sentences.en: The poem is so complicated that I cannot make out its meaning.
sentences.cn: 这首诗太复杂,我理解不了它的意思.

sentences.en: The problem is not as complicated as he imagined.
sentences.cn: 问题没他想像的那么复杂.

sentences.en: The problems grew, multiplied, and complicated beyond all reason.
sentences.cn: 这些问题发展了, 增多了, 而且复杂化了,简直不可思议.

sentences.en: The situation was complicated by the spread of a serious forest fire.
sentences.cn: 一场严重的森林大火的蔓延使得形势更加复杂。

sentences.en: The text is approachable, coping well with quite complicated subjects.
sentences.cn: 这篇课文把相当复杂的主题讲述得深入浅出、通俗易懂。

sentences.en: This problem is too complicated to be explained in a few words.
sentences.cn: 这个问题千头万绪,三言两语说不清楚.

sentences.en: Though off-puttingly complicated in detail, local taxes are in essence simple.
sentences.cn: 虽然地税在细节上复杂得要命，但在本质上却很简单。

sentences.en: To the uninitiated the system seems too complicated.
sentences.cn: 对外行而言，这个系统似乎过于复杂。

sentences.en: We can solve the problem no matter how complicated it is.
sentences.cn: 任凭问题多复杂,我们也能弄清楚.

words.tran_cn: 并发症；复杂；复杂化；混乱
使复杂化；使恶化；使卷入

trans.tran_en: difficult to understand or deal with, because many parts or details are involved
